name: Million Shades Toolkit
author: Kudrat E Khuda

sections.description: Million Shades toolkit is a custom post type plugin. Using Million Shades toolkit, you can easily register custom post types and taxonomies for your website. View our example page to see some examples that are available with Million Shades toolkit. Million Shades toolkit documentation is available on https://themenextlevel.com/docs/million-shades-toolkit/Million Shades Toolkit plugin should be used for the Million Shades WordPress theme only.You need to download and install Million Shades theme.You have to use four widgets of Million Shades such as portfolio widget,client widget,staff widget,testimonial widget to render output on your website.
sections.installation: 1. From WordPress Dashboard, go to Plugins > Add New and search for Million Shades Toolkit. Install and activate it.
sections.faq:
What is the plugin license?

  • This plugin is released under a GPL license.

What themes this plugin supports?

  • The plugin supports Million Shades theme only.

Is documentation available for this plugin?

  • Million Shades toolkit documentation is available on https://themenextlevel.com/docs/million-shades-toolkit/

short_description: This plugin registers custom post types(staff,testimonial,client and portfolio) to the Million Shades theme
description: Million Shades toolkit is a custom post type plugin. Using Million Shades toolkit, you can easily register custom post types and taxonomies for your website. View our example page to see some examples that are available with Million Shades toolkit. Million Shades toolkit documentation is available on https://themenextlevel.com/docs/million-shades-toolkit/Million Shades Toolkit plugin should be used for the Million Shades WordPress theme only.You need to download and install Million Shades theme.You have to use four widgets of Million Shades such as portfolio widget,client widget,staff widget,testimonial widget to render output on your website.
